risks: Operational delay risk due to pending bookings.
Allocation risk due to unassigned bookings.

recommendations.title: Assign providers to unassigned bookings
recommendations.action: Review unassigned bookings and allocate a provider based on route capability and SOP.
recommendations.why: Unassigned bookings can stall scheduling and increase delay risk.

recommendations.title: Reduce booking backlog
recommendations.action: Verify pending bookings are being confirmed and scheduled promptly.
recommendations.why: Backlog is a leading indicator of operational delay.

recommendations.title: Create schedule entries for active routes
recommendations.action: Create/confirm schedule slots for active routes to reflect real trip plans.
recommendations.why: No scheduled trips while routes are active suggests planning data is incomplete.

optimizations: Match pending/unassigned bookings to active providers by carrier type and coverage area.
analysis.explainability: Recommendations are based strictly on the current counts and status distribution in the database snapshot.
